products.description: Barberton Daises are living organisms that play a key role in ecosystems and the maintenance of life on Earth. They are major health and nutritional consequences for many living things, including humans. Plants, characterized by a variety of shapes, sizes and growing conditions, can be woody, herbaceous or shrubby. Depending on the species, they can grow in different climates, from the tropics to the arctic regions. Plants also have medicinal principles and are widely used in medicine, cosmetology and cooking. They are important for maintaining biodiversity and the ecological balance of the planet.
